descriptionHtml:
Note: I\'m not creating or updating mods anymore. Because of this, I give anyone permission to continue this project, make variations of it, or include it in their own files. 

Replaces a lot of female body armor with less sexual versions... the male versions. The wrists, necks, and ankles don\'t line up perfectly with the originals. This shouldn\'t be too much of a problem if you\'re wearing a full set of armor though, because most of the gloves/gauntlets are big enough to cover the misalignment.

Replaced armors:
Blades Armor
Daedric Armor
Dragonscale Armor
Ebony Armor
Ebony Mail
Elven Armor (Both types)
Glass Armor
Nightingale Armor
Orcish Armor
Steel Plate Armor
Wolf Armor

To Install put \"meshes\" into your Skyrim data folder. To remove, delete the meshes added by the mod.
